mapper.select: SELECT PT.TM_ID, PT.SRV_YN FROM PROJECT P JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT ON P.PRJ_ID = PT.PRJ_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.PRJ_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PT.TM_ID = #{empId} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N') AND PT.TM_ID = #{empId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.PRJ_ID , sq.SRV_STS , p.PRJ_NAME , p.CLNT_INFO , p.DEPT_ID , p.PRJ_STS , TO_CHAR(p.STRT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(p.END_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END_DT , d.DEPT_NAME FROM PROJECT p JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON d.DEPT_ID = p.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SURVEY_QUESTION sq ON sq.PRJ_ID = p.PRJ_ID WHERE p.DEL_YN = 'N' AND p.PRJ_STS = '409'

SELECT sq.SRV_ID , sq.PRJ_ID , sq.SRV_QST , sq.CRTR_ID , sq.CRT_DT , sq.MDFR_ID , sq.MDF_DT , sq.DEL_YN , sq.SEQ , sq.TYPE_YN , sq.SRV_STS , p.PRJ_ID , p.PRJ_NAME , d.DEPT_NAME , pt.TM_ID , pt.ROLE , e.EMP_NAME FROM (SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION) sq JOIN PROJECT p ON p.PRJ_ID = sq.PRJ_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON d.DEPT_ID = p.DEPT_ID JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE pt ON pt.PRJ_ID = p.PRJ_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON e.EMP_ID = pt.TM_ID WHERE sq.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND pt.ROLE = 'PM' AND ROWNUM = 1 AND sq.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY sq.SEQ ASC

mapper.select: SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , TO_CHAR(MDF_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND SRV_ID = #{_parameter} ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SEQ ASC

SELECT sq.SRV_ID , sq.PRJ_ID , sq.SRV_QST , sq.CRTR_ID , sq.CRT_DT , sq.MDFR_ID , sq.MDF_DT , sq.DEL_YN , sq.SEQ , sq.TYPE_YN , sq.SRV_STS , sqp.SQP_ID , sqp.SQP_CNTNT , sqp.NEXT_ID , sqp.DEL_YN , sqp.SEQ FROM (SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION) sq JOIN SURVEY_QUESTION_PICK sqp ON sqp.SRV_ID = sq.SRV_ID WHERE sq.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND ROWNUM = 1 AND sq.DEL_YN = 'N' AND sqp.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY sq.SEQ ASC
SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT SRV_ID , PRJ_ID , SRV_QST , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , DEL_YN , SEQ , TYPE_YN , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION WHERE PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SEQ ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.PRJ_ID) FROM PROJECT p LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON d.DEPT_ID = p.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE cc ON cc.CMCD_ID = p.PRJ_STS LEFT JOIN SURVEY_QUESTION sq ON sq.PRJ_ID = p.PRJ_ID WHERE p.DEL_YN = 'N' AND d.DEL_YN = 'N' AND cc.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND P.PRJ_STS = #{searchStatus}
AND p.PRJ_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND p.CLNT_INFO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND d.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND p.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE pt WHERE pt.TM_ID = #{employeeVO.empId} AND pt.DEL_YN = 'N' )

SELECT P.PRJ_ID , P.PRJ_NAME , P.CLNT_INFO , P.DEPT_ID , P.PRJ_STS , SQ.SRV_STS , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , P.DEL_YN , C.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , PT.SRV_YN FROM PROJECT P LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT ON PT.PRJ_ID = P.PRJ_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PRJ_ID , SRV_STS FROM SURVEY_QUESTION) SQ ON SQ.PRJ_ID = P.PRJ_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND P.PRJ_STS = #{searchStatus}
AND P.PRJ_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.CLNT_INFO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PT.TM_ID = #{employeeVO.empId} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N' )
ORDER BY P.CRT_DT DESC
